name: Kemin Industries, Inc. LC
description: Kemin Industries, Inc. LC is comprised of Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sunflower oil and Rosemary, ext. Extractives and their physically modified derivatives such as tinctures, concretes, absolutes, essential oils, oleoresins, terpenes, terpene-free fractions, distillates, residues, etc., obtained from Rosmarinus officinalis, Labiatae.. It is commonly used It is a Preservative-free Key benefits in use include: Anti-irritant, Antioxidant, Smoothing and Soothing.
